short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access van hack jobs and events

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of checking VanHack website for new jobs, updates and events over and over?

VanHack quick access is a chrome extension that will allow you to easily access job update, events. You can apply to jobs, check and update event in no time! Yay!
